basics.name: Cassie Galvez
basics.label: Graphic Designer
basics.summary: I am a graphic designer based in Tri-Cities, WA. I earned a Bachelors degree in Visual Communication Design and a Certificate in User Experience Design from Eastern Washington University in June of 2018.

work.summary: Designed artwork for the EWU Libraries, including print and digital materials to promote library events, programs, and initiatives. Worked within time constraints, deadlines, style guides, and a multi-step approval process. Member of the librariesâ€™ Marketing Task Force to increase student engagement.
highlights: Timely managed up to seven projects or tasks at a given time while under pressure to meet strict deadlines.
Experience with multi-tasking, style guides, working with large teams, multi-step approval processes, and handling projects from concept to final product.
Experience with printing on industrial printers, from projects as small as business cards to projects as large as thirty-foot-long backdrops.

awards.title: Student Photographer of the Year Award
